Federal Polytechnic Idah, nke bụbu Idah College of Technology, bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke gọọmentị etiti nwere nke e guzobere na 1977 na Idah, Kogi Steeti. Ọ kwadoro saịtị na National Board for Technical Education ma na-enyekwa Mba Diploma na Nke ka elu Mba Diploma ọmụmụ na ọkwa ndị na-agụsị akwụkwọ na ebumnuche nke ịzụ ndị ọrụ asọmpi maka mmepe.
Ndepụta nke ọmụmụ dịnụ nke Federal Polytechnic Idah nyere gụnyere:
